vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Ἄσσος, -ου
(also Ἀσσός, -οῦ), ή
Assos, a city on the E. coast of Asia Minor: Act.20:13-14 (see: ἆσσον).†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef: § Assos, a maritime city of Mysia, in Asia Minor, Acts 20:13-14*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
亞朔 这个專有地名在原文的意思是 "臨近"
亞洲羅馬省份的一個海港城 (徒 20:13,14)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
亚朔 这个专有地名在原文的意思是 "临近"
亚洲罗马省份的一个海港城 (徒 20:13,14)
